definition: to generate electricity/to send a telegram
to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)
lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc
fired power plant (i.e. fired by coal, oil or gas)

pinyin: yuan2 zi3 neng2 fa1 dian4 zhan4
hai3 yang2 wen1 cha1 fa1 dian4

sentences.english: Finally the researches on the MHD dynamo and other kinds of dynamos are briefly discussed.
sentences.chinese: 討論了MHD發電機和其它類型發電機的研究概況。

sentences.english: Finally the researches on the MHD dynamo and other kinds of dynamos are briefly discussed.
sentences.chinese: 討論了MHD發電機和其它類型發電機的研究概況。

sentences.english: The retaining ring is an important component of turbogenerator.
sentences.chinese: 護環是汽輪發電機的重要部件。

sentences.english: As the macro-scale fundamental construction, thermal power electricity generation has important impact on national economy.
sentences.chinese: 火力發電廠的經濟性主要取決於電站鍋爐的熱效率。

sentences.english: Currently, the development of wind energy resources in Dongying City is mainly embodied in wind power generation.
sentences.chinese: 目前東營市風能資源的發展主要體現在風力發電上。

sentences.english: Ocean waves move the hydraulic fluid, which spins the generator.
sentences.chinese: 海浪推動液壓油從而驅動發電機運轉。

sentences.english: A nonlinear steam valve controller is designed by using the proposed method.
sentences.chinese: 應用該方法設計了發電機主汽門非線性魯棒控制器。

sentences.english: He drew an axis on it first then fixed it carefully.
sentences.chinese: 他首先在發電機上畫了一條軸線然後仔細修理起來。

sentences.english: The propeller turns a small d. c. generator .
sentences.chinese: 螺旋槳帶動一個小型直流發電機。

sentences.english: A concrete plan in the power factory using waste incinerating is developed.
sentences.chinese: 並給出在垃圾焚燒發電廠的具體實施方案。

sentences.english: The generator shall be in the horizontal position with the tube oriented horizontally.
sentences.chinese: 臥置的發電機上連接的那根管子的走向應呈水平方向。

sentences.english: The promise of fuel cells for efficient, eco-friendly power generation has become a reality.
sentences.chinese: 承諾燃料電池的效率高，環保型發電已成爲現實。

sentences.english: Tomorrow I am going to teach my grandma (on my mother's side) how to send email.
sentences.chinese: 聽日我會教我婆婆點樣發電郵。

sentences.english: I wonder if I can send cables without cash payment.
sentences.chinese: 我不知道是否可以不用現款拍發電報。

sentences.english: Traditional electricity generation is inherently wasteful.
sentences.chinese: 傳統的發電方式有着固有的浪費性。

sentences.english: Meanwhile the solid by-products, rich in energy, could be incinerated as well.
sentences.chinese: 同樣，富含能量的固體廢棄物可焚燒發電。

definition: a power station/an electricity generating plant
saving/to save/to use sparingly/to cut down on
fuel gas (coal gas, natural gas, methane etc)
running/operation (of airport, bus service, business etc)
